messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1167
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/25/01 11:42:32 AM Mountain Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/25/01 11:42:32 AM Mountain Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< WHERE do you live that you need cable to get PBS? >>
Maybe she lives near me? We cannot get TV w/ out cable and some areas do
not have cable. Excuse me I forgot we can get 3 channels w/out cable. Maybe
it is mountainous in her neck of the woods also?

NICKI~ who didn't have TV off and on in her life and hasn't had much sleep
since we moved 2 weeks ago due to watching late night crap. It has always
been my theory that.... that which you forbid will become an addiction for
some. (my mother forbid junk food and TV)
